Nothing better than this Tapas restaurant.   The hostess and bartender and the food was amazing.They gave us the best two bar seats and within. Minute the restaurant was packed and locals were waiting for seats.  Quite,the opposite from the previous night at a different restaurant when we had to wait 90 minutes while all the Spanish speaking patrons who came after us ere served.  Great wine, and all dishes were perfect.  No reason to name one dish as all were great.  Make this a definite stop.
